data.actual_result: The profile picture overlaps the indicator. Sometimes it fixes itself others it sticks until you read the message.
data.expected_result: The unread indicator should appear over the profile picture showing you have an unread message.
data.short_description: New ping/unread message indicator (the number) hides behind profile picture of DM messages when discord isn't focused.
data.steps_to_repro: - click out of discord to another window on your computer - get a DM message
